name: draw-html-to-canvas
description: 根据html+css规范绘制 网页到canvas

scripts.build: rimraf -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production rollup -c rollup.config.js && npm run build:d.ts
scripts.build:d.ts: rimraf -rf types && tsc -t es5 --declaration --outDir ./types ./src/*.ts ./src/**/*.ts && rimraf types/**/*.js types/*.js

author: nap.liu
